snippet.title: Brooklyn Gathering Holds Promise of NExT Big Thing
snippet.description:
Brooklyn Gathering Holds Promise of NExT Big Thing
By Leon Lazaroff 10:55 AM EDT 06/14/13
Brooklyn's NExT gathering is a mindshare and something of a celebration for a borough that's having fun building start-up companies.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11950304/1/brooklyn-gathering-holds-promise-of-next-big-thing.html
